de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.formatter

Interface Formatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseFormatter, PostFormatter, SiteFormatter

    public interface Formatter
    Implementors read an Markdown file input stream and format it to an string.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String format(InputStream markdownFile)
      Formats the input file to string.
      String format(String markdown)
      Formats the input string to string.
      void setBaseUri(String baseUri)
      Set the site base URI.
      void setDescription(String description)
      Set the site description.
      void setEncoding(String encoding)
      Set the site encoding.
      void setKeywords(String keywords)
      Set the site keywords.
      void setTitle(String title)
      Set the site title.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        String format(InputStream markdownFile)
              throws IOException,
                     freemarker.template.TemplateException
        Formats the input file to string.
        Parameters:
        markdownFile - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null
        Throws:
        IOException - if markdown or any template can't be read
        freemarker.template.TemplateException - the template produce any parse errors
